name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Backend Developer with 8 years of experience in designing and implementing high-performance solutions while specializing in **Java**, **Kotlin**, and **Spring Framework**, leveraging expertise in **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL** for robust database management. Proficient in **microservices** architecture and familiar with cloud services, primarily **AWS**. Solid background in development practices that emphasize unit testing and integration testing to ensure code quality and reliability. 
I have extensive experience in full-stack development using languages such as **Python** and frameworks like **React** and **Node.js**, and I have led the deployment of enterprise-grade systems that integrate complex features tailored for the healthcare and financial sectors. Further, my hands-on experience with CI/CD automation helps streamline the development process, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, while my knowledge of version control systems like **Git** coupled with **Gradle** for build automation, positions me as a well-rounded technology professional.
